name: Divi
movement: walk 30 ft., burrow 30 ft., fly 30 ft.
description: The Divi is a large elemental creature with a solid physical presence, utilizing earth and stone manipulation powers in combat. It has exceptionally high Strength and Constitution scores, making it resilient and deadly.
memorable: The ability to burrow silently through earth and its devastating Quake ability, which creates difficult terrain and inflicts thunder damage.
goals: To dominate the battlefield using its formidable physical attacks and control combat with terrain manipulation.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures and may serve alongside or control earth-based beings.
environment: Typically found in rocky or earthy terrains, often in caves or mountainous areas.
strengths: Noteworthy damage resistance to acid, immunity to petrification, and excellent physical combat abilities.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, limiting its social interaction and magical prowess.
attacks: Attacks with a Crushing Hand that grapples while dealing bludgeoning damage, and a Stone Club for longer reach and high damage output.
most_powerful_ability: Quake ability creates difficult terrain and inflicts thunder damage in a wide area.
senses: The Divi has tremorsense up to 30 feet and darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to navigate its environment effectively.
skills: Possesses proficiency in athletics and a good passive perception score, enhancing its physical prowess and awareness.
additional_information: Can use Earth Glide to burrow without disturbing the ground.
Innate spellcasting choices allow for terrain control and temporary creations.
Stone Wall ability provides strategic barriers on the battlefield.
Multiattack enables it to maximize its offensive capabilities in combat.
Communicates in Terran, the language of earth elementals.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability includes spells such as alter self, stone shape, and the ability to summon earth elementals.
test_queries: earth elemental with powerful melee attacks
monster that can burrow and create walls
large creature with devastating quake ability
elemental known for physical endurance and strength
